description: The trail runner that started it all continues to evolve. With the Lone Peak 5, you get all the legacy with all the updates. For the first time, the Lone Peak features the responsive AltraEGO™ midsole. The MaxTrac™ outsole returns, ready to conquer all types of trails, and an updated StoneGuard™ brings an extra layer of rock protection.
name: Altra Lone Peak 5 - Mens
